item.title: About me
item.description: Hi! 👋 I am a data scientist and a hobbyist. I love my work and I try my best to make it. Education 🎓 I completed my undergraduate studies in Physics at Istanbul University and am pursuing a Master’s degree in the field. Work 💼 I am a Machine Learning Engineer at P.I. Works Skills 🧰 Python Scikit-learn, Numpy, Pandas, Matplotlib, Seaborn, PyMC, Tensorflow, PyTorch Docker, FastAPI, Jupyter, SQL, Git, Bash Languages 🌍 Turkish 🇹🇷 English 🇺🇸 Projects 🔥 I am currently working on Academic Researcher Agent

item.title: Projects
item.description: Data science projects for academic, self-learning, and hobby
